comments:
I20040210 on the Mac

1) started with fresh, empty, workspace
2) start checking out several projects from CVS repository (7 total)
3) after several checked out, open Java perspective
4) see dialogue indicating background job blocked
5) after about 1 minute, the dialogue was replaced by an error dialogue
(Progress Error)

From the error log view...
